ChunkText: while it may sound daunting, this can absolutely be done, and many students have successfully renewed their visa during their OPT or stem OPT periods. please contact the isss office at isss@umbc.edu for more specific guidance on how to approach your visa interview in your specific situation.
ContextBefore: youll need to make it clear to the official interviewing you that your goals in the US are still ultimately academic in nature, and that you still intend to return home after you complete your academic goals.
